name: Town of Salem 2
description:
Town of Salem 2 is releasing into Early Access May 26th, 2023! Wishlist now!


The Town of Salem is in turmoil as the Coven has taken over. Will you have what it takes to survive?


How To Play
Join up to 14 other players online and use your wit and abilities to emerge victorious. As a Town member, your goal is to lead your fellow members to victory by identifying and eliminating your opposition. Use your role's unique abilities to reveal yourself as innocent, track down killers, or even take down suspicious individuals. There are countless ways to play and win.

Meanwhile, the Coven, Neutral, and Apocalypse factions work from the shadows, using their own abilities to thwart the Town's efforts. Whether it's burning away dead bodies, blocking Town members' abilities, or going on a killing rampage, each role has its own unique approach to achieving victory.

New Roles

With a vast array of new roles there are countless ways to play and win. Each role has its own set of abilities. Abilities such as taking fate into their own hands and killing during the day, Knighting another player giving them extra votes, and using blood rituals to destroy your enemies if you know their role.

New Apocalypse Faction and Four Horsemen Game Mode
.
The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse are here, each with their own way to win.

With so many roles to choose from, every game is different and exciting.

More Control Than Ever Before!
Scrolls can boost your chance of being your favorite role, while Cursed Scrolls can reduce the chance you get roles you dislike.

You can ban specific roles or add your favorite game modifiers, such as VIP or Town Traitor, to create the perfect role list for your game.

Private custom lobbies allow you to invite your friends with a simple six-letter code or browse custom lobbies to join other games.

And with free movement in lobbies, at night, and as a ghost, you have more freedom to explore the game world.

Communication
Communication is also easier than ever, with the ability to tag players, roles, and keywords in chat.

Personalization
Customization is a key feature in Town of Salem 2. From customizing your character and pet to your house's interior, you have more control than ever before.

With so many new features and roles to discover, Town of Salem 2 is an exciting and unique experience that you won't want to miss.

Wishlist now! Help the fight against the Coven, or... join them.
